data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility Remains High
data.Description: RustyBrick observes ongoing high volatility in Google Search rankings and provides updated charts illustrating the trend. There has been so much volatility since early May (AFTER the March core update completed), with a number of reversals, that it is not recommended to make huge changes based on that volatility until the next core update rolls out.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rolling Out to All Merchants
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now supports supplemental feeds, a significant update for e-commerce businesses using the platform. Starting this July, it is finally coming to all merchant accounts, with a refreshed user interface, reinvented complex features & new experiences.

data.Title: Google Confirms Ranking Boost for Country Code Domains
data.Description: Google confirms that using a country code top-level domain (ccTLD) helps you rank better in a regional version of Google, but it helps even more to use that localized language on your page. This emphasizes the importance of ccTLDs for international SEO.

data.Title: How to Evaluate Your SEO Team's Performance
data.Description: This article summarizes Google's John Mueller's advice on evaluating the effectiveness of an SEO team, emphasizing transparency and measurable results. Google's John Mueller shares tips on checking if the SEO company you hired is actually doing the work they promised.

data.Title: Google to End Support for goo.gl Shortener Links in 2025
data.Description: Aleyda highlights Google's announcement that goo.gl shortener links will stop working after August 25, 2025, potentially impacting existing links.

data.Title: Billions of Redirects to Stop Working
data.Description: Billions of redirects to stop working

data.Title: Website Accessibility Crucial for Search Ranking and Legal Compliance
data.Description: A study found that 95% of websites fail to meet Web Content Accessibility Guidelines — and accessibility is key to boosting website traffic. Here's what to do.

data.Title: Google Search Notes Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google ends its Notes Search and Discover labs experiment. With Google Notes going away, people are trying to archive them.

data.Title: Teads and Outbrain Rumored to Merge in Ad Tech Deal
data.Description: The latest installment of ad tech M&A activity is leaving some industry folks surprised.

data.Title: OpenAI Releases GPT-4o Mini
data.Description: OpenAI launches GPT-4o mini, a smaller, cheaper offshoot of GPT-4o, replacing GPT-3.5 Turbo, with support for all multimodal inputs and outputs coming soon
